summary: Three friends dream up the Compaq portable computer at a Texas diner in 1981, and soon find themselves battling mighty IBM for PC supremacy. Their improbable journey altered the future of computing and shaped the world we now know.
cast: Rod Canion|Jim Harris|Bill Murto|Bill Fargo|Alec Berg|Christopher Cantwell|Mitch Kapor|John Markoff|Chris Garcia|Bill Aulet|Bob Jackson|Howard Anderson|Ross Cooley|Hugh Barnes|Gary Stimac|Steve Ullrich|Steve Flannigan|Ben Rosen|Mike Swavely|Karen Walker|Charles Lee|Kim Francois|Roger McNamee|Ken Price|Steve Ballmer|Gary Burghoff|Stewart Cheifet|John Cleese|David Copperfield|Lou Dobbs|Bill Gates|David Graham|Peter Jennings|Jan Lewis|Larry Linville|Anya Major|Harry Morgan|Hakeem Olajuwon|The Pointer Sisters|Ronald Reagan|William Shatner|Stuart Varney
title: Silicon Cowboys
